# summary

**Instance Property**

The summary that the picker’s item displays.

## Declaration

```swift
var summary: String? { get set }
```

## Managing the Picker Item’s Data

- **title**: The title that the picker’s item displays.
- **subtitle**: The subtitle that the picker’s item displays.

items.description: The title that the picker’s item displays.
items.name: title

items.description: The subtitle that the picker’s item displays.
items.name: subtitle

title: summary
